name: Shores of Loci
description:
The Shores of Loci is a single player narrative puzzle game that can only be experienced in VR. With compelling characters, beautiful cinematic scenes and surreal worlds, the Shores of Loci will transport you to other dimensions to create visions larger than life.
In this multidimensional story, Giants and Villagers alike need your help to reclaim their lands and rebuild their cities. Complete your journey creating a universe where puzzled pieces are assembled and transformed.

Reviews

“The only weapon you need is your brain.” -Aaron Pulkka, Program Director- Amber Labs

“Wow. Absolutely stunning.” -Toni Parisi, Head of XR Ads & E-commerce- Unity

“Leaves you in a good mood with a sweet sense of achievement.”

“Such a beautiful world & I’m learning to improve my puzzle & problem solving skills!”

“This will probably be my most recommended game… and I own 230!”

There is no wrong way to play and no rush to finish, just enjoy your time along the Shores of Loci. As you play, you find out you are the missing piece to completing the story and bringing balance to more adventures than one. Cities and villages become populated with unique characters as you build out your creations along The Shores of Loci. Welcome to this all accessible game for all ages with no wrong way to play, create and share your experience.

Gameplay Features

  • Intuitive gameplay creates an all accessible inclusive experience while you travel through the Shores of Loci.

  • In the Shores of Loci you will adventure to fantastic places and find your place in a story larger than life.

  • Calming audio encourages a relaxed gameplay as you bring to life your environments and help your new friends in The Shores of Loci.
  • Cities and villages become populated with unique characters as you build out your creations along The Shores of Loci.

Be the architect to your adventure story.

  • Single player
  • World building
  • Beautiful
  • Puzzle
  • Narrative
  • All accessible
  • Standing or Seated
  • Interactive
  • Thematic
  • Creative puzzling
  • Otherworldly

Escape the Ordinary, Create the Extraordinary. A Puzzling Adventure by MikeTeevee.
